title: alaya viDudal
sahitya:
alaya viDudal nyAyamA rAmA aNDina enakkaruL tarAmal ennai


anupallavi

  nilaiyilAda ulaga vAzhvil alai kaDalait-turumbena nALum


caraNam    pADip-parandu malar tEDip-pughundu madu varundum vaNDenaip-padamalar nADi pugazh-
 pADik-kaLi kUDi nin nAmarasam parugi aruL nADi vADittavikkum ennai
